properties.arbitrate-send: during a successful call to `arbitrate`, the arbiter receives `fee` ETH.
properties.auth-in-agree: in the Agree state, only the buyer and the seller can perform actions.
properties.auth-in-dispute: in the Dispute state, only the arbiter can perform actions.
properties.dispute-if-agree: in the Agree state, both the buyer and the seller can open a dispute.
properties.dispute-onlyif-agree: a dispute can be opened only in the Agree state.
properties.no-send-in-agree: in the Agree state, no one can redeem ETH.
properties.recipient-buyer-or-seller: the recipient of the `redeem` call must be either the buyer or the seller.
properties.redeem-send: after a successful call to `redeem`, either the buyer or the seller receives `deposit` ETH.
